explicit.rewards

Class StateRewards

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.rewards.StateRewards
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MCRewards, MDPRewards, Rewards, STPGRewards
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StateRewardsArray, StateRewardsConstant, StateRewardsSimple

    public abstract class StateRewards
extends java.lang.Object
implements MCRewards, MDPRewards, STPGRewards
    Explicit-state storage of just state rewards.

      Get the state reward for state s.

      Get the transition reward for the ith choice from state s.
      boolean hasTransitionRewards()
      Returns true if this reward structure has transition rewards
      abstract StateRewards liftFromModel(Product<? extends Model> product)
      Create a new reward structure that lifts this one such that it is defined over states of a model that is a product of the one that this reward structure is defined over.
